targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(num_queries)/60 as QPS
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    sum(num_queries)/60 as QPS
FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630357260) AND toDateTime(1630358590)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql','localhost.localdomain-mysql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )

GROUP BY t

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries)/60 as QPS
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

GROUP BY t, service_type

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries)/60 as QPS
FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql' )

GROUP BY t, service_type

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    fingerprint as Query, 
    service_name,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries) as Count, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum) as TotTime, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(num_queries) as AvgTime, 
    max(m_query_time_max) as MaxTime
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )
and fingerprint != 'COMMIT'
GROUP BY queryid, fingerprint, service_name, service_type

ORDER BY TotTime desc
limit 10
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    fingerprint as Query, 
    service_name,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries) as Count, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum) as TotTime, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(num_queries) as AvgTime, 
    max(m_query_time_max) as MaxTime
FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start >= toDateTime(1630432140)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-mysql','localhost.localdomain-postgresql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )
and fingerprint != 'COMMIT'
GROUP BY queryid, fingerprint, service_name, service_type

ORDER BY TotTime desc
limit 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(m_query_time_cnt)*1000 as ReposnseTime

FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

group by t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(m_query_time_cnt)*1000 as ReposnseTime

FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql' )

group by t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    service_type,
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(m_query_time_cnt)*1000 as ReposnseTime

FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

GROUP BY t, service_type
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,
    service_type,
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(m_query_time_cnt)*1000 as ReposnseTime

FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql','localhost.localdomain-mysql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )

GROUP BY t, service_type
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    (m_query_time_sum / m_query_time_cnt) * 1000
    
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter

and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

order by t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    (m_query_time_sum / m_query_time_cnt) * 1000
    
FROM pmm.metrics
WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)

and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql','localhost.localdomain-mysql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )

order by t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toDate(period_start) as Day,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 1, 1, 0)) AS `0-1ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) >= 1, if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 10, 1, 0), 0)) AS `1-10ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) >= 10, if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 100, 1, 0), 0)) AS `10-100ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) >= 100, if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 1000, 1, 0), 0)) AS `100-1000ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) > 1000, 1, 0), 0) AS `>1000ms`
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and database in ( $db_name )

GROUP BY period_length, Day, Hour , ts

ORDER BY Day desc , Hour desc
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toDate(period_start) as Day,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 1, 1, 0)) AS `0-1ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) >= 1, if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 10, 1, 0), 0)) AS `1-10ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) >= 10, if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 100, 1, 0), 0)) AS `10-100ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) >= 100, if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) < 1000, 1, 0), 0)) AS `100-1000ms`,
    sum(if((m_query_time_sum * 1000) > 1000, 1, 0), 0) AS `>1000ms`
FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630357260) AND toDateTime(1630358580)
and service_name in ( 'pmm-server-postgresql' )
and database in ( $db_name )

GROUP BY period_length, Day, Hour , ts

ORDER BY Day desc , Hour desc
